name: Medieval Detective VR
description:
You open your eyes to darkness. In front of you lies a cryptic, unsigned note. Follow the hints of your strange benefactor to uncover the mystery of what happened in this room before you arrived.

A narrative-driven VR game designed for the Google Cardboard.

Credits:
  • Kat Byers - scripting
  • Mary Gerik - level design, voice acting
  • Olivia Elmers - scripting, writing

Sounds from Freesound. Models and particles from the Unity Asset Store. Font from DaFont.
